MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW5 postcode area of Nantwich, affecting properties in Station View, Whitlow Avenue and surrounding streets. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers onsite are carrying out investigations on the network to locate the cause of the fuse failures. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12.30middday. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9am on 27th of Feb 2021.
